description:
We are currently looking for a Marketing Data Analyst.

We have 1 open position. Please apply and we can discuss!

Location: Anywhere in the US (Remote)

Salary: $100,000 - $120,000

Benefits: Full benefits

Type: Full-Time, Direct Hire

Sponsorship Available: No

Most Important:

  • 4-5 years of retention marketing experience
  • Strategic mindset - understands how to ask the right questions to get to the bottom of a problem
  • Experience with pressure testing around churn analytics, offers, etc
  • Experience creating strategy decks and presenting them to upper management to help drive decision making
  • Strong powerpoint and excel skills
  • Experience creating business cases and driving projects forward - can explain financial impact on an offer
  • Comfortable wearing multiple hats

Responsibilities:

  • Confident, sharp, Go getter mentality - can persuade people when needed
  • Work with C-Level Executives to Develop and Execute Marketing Strategy
  • Experience with Analytics and User Research to track KPIs and Metrics
  • Define Product Messaging across Web and Mobile to drive User Adoption
  • Work with Stakeholders and Customers to Implement New Features and Validation

If the above seems like a fit, then apply!!

CRB Workforce, LLC provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws.

This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation and training.
